page.title: 20Mochdre Industrial Estate
page.content: There is a factory estate on our patch.Here are some of the things they make Presco....Portable buildings Elkay.....Switches and connectors Tootal....Ties Contact Poweriser..Fork lift equipment Coventry Eagle.....Bicycles Shopfix...Furniture Rainbow Products..Lunchboxes Eagle Brewery..Beer Tacla Dev..Display Equipment Laura Ashley..Material for clothes Pamargan Products..Oil seals Control Techniques..Thyristor Drives Aerosonic..Video tape test equipment Basil Matthews...Bronze Figurines There are small units providing services,and Laura Ashley are building a big new factory..
